The game is good if you like scary thrills and 10 minute matches of fun! It has something for everyone, though I tend to gravitate towards survivor due to the coop play. If you like to play solo, the killer role makes for something different if you like devious and chase play. 

The pros are that the game creates camaraderie with strangers, potentially earning you good friendships from around the world. 

The most major con is that due to the competitive nature of both survivors and killers, there is an element of abusive play that is sometimes shown from both sides of play.

The take away would be not to take the game too seriously, as ultimately, competitive play will ruin your experience.

Jogo maravilhoso, eu poderia jogar horas seguidas, o modo killer contra sobreviventes exige bastante de quem esta jogando, na parte de estratégias, inteligências saber utilizar as vantagens que você levou para a partida e principalmente tentar compreender o quanto antes o estilo de jogo de seus oponentes, para que você consiga entrar na mente deles o mais breve possível.

Ja de sobrevivente fica uma dica importante! Existem dois tipos de jogar, com amigos e sem amigos. É muito importante que você entenda isso, pois o objetivo é se livrar do killer, fazer geradores, abrir portões e escapar, quando se esta com amigos as funções são dividas e logo cada uma assume um papel no game, que vai se alternando no decorrer da partida, mas ambos sabem da importância de ajudar o outro (Altruísmo puro), ja jogando sozinho todos tem em mente escapar independente das circunstâncias, mesmo que isso acabe por te matar. Então o Altruísmo passa a ser mais opcional, de acordo com as circunstâncias.

Ultima dica pra quem esta pensando em comprar o game ou recém comprou. Veja vídeos uteis que ensinam a como jogar com um killer específico ou como jogar de sobrevivente, aprenda nome dos lugares (sim o mapa tem casas, janelas e outros e possuem nomes para ajudar na comunicação), e por fim compreenda quais são as vantagens de cada sobrevivente e use-as de acordo com sua necessidade.

Fun and sometimes challenging to play alone as the Killer.
Challenging and sometimes fun to play with friends as Survivor. 

+Lots of active players daily 
+Receives regular patches
+A new killer/survivor release every 3-4 months
+Very fun and satisfying at times

-Easy to get into and do well at lower ranks, but as you get higher and higher, the 'skill cap' raises up, making you learn new techniques and refine your gameplay if you want to advance
-Can be tedious, frustrating and maddening at times, even if you play well

These are some of the basic pointers, there's much more in-depths stuff, like min-maxing and optimizing your actions, small things here and there which you have to know/use to perform well at higher ranks. 
However, if you just want to have fun and enjoy [strike]slaughtering[/strike] surviving in a horror game - should give this game a try.

This game is a great game if you're looking to kill some time with a quick game. There are some hit register issues such as when you vault through a window you'll get hit after being a mile away from it. The DLC killers all bring something special to the table in their own unique ways and there ins't one that isn't stronger than the other. There are countless perk and add-on combinations that change the game up every match depending on how you use them. At the time of this review the game is $8 and the DLC's are $3.50 each, there is no reason to not pick this game up if you don't like horror, competitive multiplayer, or just a good time.

This game is great, especially if you have friends to play it with, but there are just some times that you just wanna leave the match. A great feature would be not being able to lose health if you're losing HP on a hook while the killer is camping you. Other than some things, I would 8/10 recommend this game.

Com base na minha experiência, posso dizer que Dead By Daylight (vulgo DBD) é uma experiência bem interessante. Seja na pele do assassino ou até mesmo como sobreviventes, continua tão divertido quanto antes. Particularmente, meu favorito é o modo Assassino (modo Killer). Ainda assim, o jogo faz grande esforço em ser variado, com cenários gerados e bastante conteúdo personalizável à disposição. Existem alguns pequenos bugs visuais e problemas de conexão à internet e, no geral, ele é bem mais divertido só quando jogamos com um grupo de pessoas.
Good game, it's less broken than before, but it still needs to pach (a lot) of bugs

Muy entretenido el juego para jugarlo solo o con amigos, puedes estar jugando varias horas y no te vas a aburrir.¿Recomiendo este juego? Si,mas si esta de oferta.
A continuación voy a comenzar a comentar lo que tiene de bueno y lo malo de este juego.
Lo Bueno:
+Cada cierto tiempo entre 3 o 4 meses te ofrecen nuevo contenido.
+Viven solucionando todos los errores que van apareciendo a lo largo del tiempo.
Lo Malo
-Si quieres tener el juego completo osea tener todos los superviviente y los asesinos tienes que pagar para el contenido extra a lo que lleva un incremento de gasto para tu bolsillo.
-El nuevo sistema de matchmaking no sirve esta rotisimo, por que razón digo esto? por que las cuantas veces que he jugado con mi team rangos rojos siempre nos emparejaba con asesinos de rango 20 osea un desventaja muy grande para el asesino y se pierde la emoción de jugar así.
jogo muito assustador e aterrorizante uma otima pegada pra quem quer um jogo bem imercivo e com muitas aventuras!!!!

The optimal way to play Dead by Daylight is with your friends. If you are playing survivor, its much more casual. You can pick 4 perks you wanna play with, but its not particularly important. Or if you have at a bad couple of runs, you can bring the meta and have a really high chance of winning. As a survivor your own skill level more often than not, can drastically change the outcome of the game. But playing killer is a different story. Once you get past the first hump of skill and you start going against not brand new players, you learn that past a certain point your skill is undeniably invalidated constantly. It can be everything to bugs to the maps to perks, smart survivors will use the dirtiest things against you. In fact that is really the theme of playing killer. EVERYTHING is against you. If you try to play casually the game works really hard to punish you for it. The community is not only quick to taunt you for losing but also for taking a match seriously and using everything in your arsenal. Basically in Dead by Daylight, if you enjoy the idea of survivor you are going to have fun, but if killer is really what is selling the game to you I would advise you look somewhere else.
